definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: meaning wholly dub.; only [[רוּחַ קָדִים חֲרִישְׁית]] Jon 4:8; a silent east wind is not suitable in context; still = sultry is mere conject.; Hi autumnal (√ I. [[חרשׁ]]); St. prop. [[חרישׂית]] = [[חריסית]], fr. [[חֶרֶס]] sun (or √ whence [[חֶרֶס]] comes) hot east wind; We makes no attempt to explain.
